sel.lang



string translate(Translation translation, string lang, string[] args = []);
Translates a translatable elements into a string in the given language.

struct Translation;
Translation container for a multi-platform translation. The 
sel
translation should never be empty and it should be a string loaded from a language file. The 
minecraft
and 
pocket
strings can either be a client-side translated message or empty. In that case the 
sel
string is translated server-side and sent to the client.

Example:
// server-side string
Translation("example.test");

// server-side for minecraft and client-side for pocket
Translation("description.help", "", "commands.help.description");


const string sel;
Values.

const string minecraft;
Values.

const string pocket;
Values.

interface Messageable;
Interface implemented by a class that can receive raw and translatable messages.
